# coordinate

**Interface Property**

A map coordinate that provides a hint for the geographic area to search.

## Declaration

```swift
coordinate?: Coordinate;
```

## Discussion

This overrides the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/SearchConstructorOptions/coordinate] provided to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Search] onstructor.

## Autocomplete search initialization

- **language**: A language ID that determines the language for the search result text.
- **region**: A map region that provides a hint for the geographic area to search.
